headline: Why CarMax (KMX) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of used automotive vehicle retailer Carmax (NYSE:KMX) jumped 3% in the morning session after JPMorgan upgraded the stock's rating to "Neutral" from "Underweight". The investment bank indicated a less negative outlook on the used-car retailer. Concurrent with the upgrade, JPMorgan lowered its price target on CarMax shares to $58 from a previous target of $65. Despite the reduction in the price forecast, the improved rating from "Underweight" was the likely catalyst that pushed the stock hi

headline: Emerson Electric slips, Carmax upgraded, Perrigo sales miss
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton tracks Wednesday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Emerson Electric (EMR) stock is under pressure after the company reported third quarter results. Carmax (KMX) was upgraded to Neutral from Underweight by JPMorgan. The firm also lowered its price target on the stock to $58 from $65. Perrigo (PRGO) stock is sliding after the company reported a net earnings and sales miss. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Emerson Electric slips, Carmax upgraded, Perrigo sales miss
content.description:
Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton tracks Wednesday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute.

Emerson Electric (EMR) stock is under pressure after the company reported third quarter results.

Carmax (KMX) was upgraded to Neutral from Underweight by JPMorgan. The firm also lowered its price target on the stock to $58 from $65.

Perrigo (PRGO) stock is sliding after the company reported a net earnings and sales miss.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
